bordered.description: Whether or not to display borders

:footer.description: At the bottom of the list

itemLayout.description: Set the 'List.Item' layout, set to 'vertical' to display vertically, and default horizontally
itemLayout.description_zh: 设置 `List.Item` 布局, 设置成 `vertical` 则竖直样式显示, 默认横排

loading.description: While the card content is still loading, you can use 'loading' to display a placeholder
loading.description_zh: 当卡片内容还在加载中时，可以用 `loading` 展示一个占位

locale.description: The default copy settings, which currently include empty data copy
locale.description_zh: 默认文案设置，目前包括空数据文案

pagination.description: For the corresponding 'pagination' configuration, set false to not be displayed
pagination.description_zh: 对应的 `pagination` 配置, 设置 false 不显示

:renderItem.description: When using dataSource, you can customize the render list item with 'renderItem'
:renderItem.description_zh: 当使用 dataSource 时，可以用 `renderItem` 自定义渲染列表项

rowKey.description: When the 'renderItem' custom render list item is valid, customize how the 'key' for each row is obtained
rowKey.description_zh: 当 `renderItem` 自定义渲染列表项有效时，自定义每一行的 `key` 的获取方式

split.description: Whether or not to display a dividing line
